title: Strictly Come Dancing fans in meltdown over Cheryl's surprise appearance
text:
The video will start in 8 Cancel

Get the biggest Strictly Come Dancing stories by email Subscribe Thank you for subscribing We have more newsletters Show me See our privacy notice Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email

Cheryl's fans are dedicated to say the least.

Now the Fight For This Love hit maker has sent them into a tizzy with an appearance in the Strictly Come Dancing crowd.

The cameras lingered on the pop queen as co-hosts Tess Daly and Claudia Winkleman jived their way onto the stage.

Chezza stunned in a glittery gold blazer alongside pals.

She wore her long brunette locks in a sleek, straight style.

Fans took to Twitter to gush over the star.

One wrote: "I'll actually not shut up all night at the fact cheryl is at strictly."

Another asked: "how many times do you think the cameras willbe pointing on cheryl tonight? #strictly."

(Image: BBC)

(Image: BBC)

A third could hardly contain themselves: "Cheryl's at Strictly Come Dancing ! Almost screamed when I saw her on the tv!"

A fourth seemed to agree: "When I seen Cheryl on strictly I hopped off my chair and screamed."

Cheryl's not the only star that's got social media talking.

The Week Five show has seen Fresh Prince of Bel Air star Alfonso Ribeiro step in for the absent Bruno Tonioli.

One said: "So glad Alfonso Ribeiro is back on #Strictly. I love how he gives comments to the contestants without being nasty. @bbcstrictly."

Another loved his high scoring: "Trust Alfonso to be generous with the scoring #Strictly."
description: The pop sensation has been enjoying tonight's live show, and fans
